headline: Cholera in Côte d'Ivoire
main_text: WHO has reported a total of 70 cases, including 15 deaths in the village of Tabléguikou-gly in the district of Divot from 22 December 2002 - 5 January 2003. Cholera has been laboratory confirmed by Institut Pasteur, Còte d'Ivoire. Control measures are in place and appropriate medication is available.
